targets.expr: sum(pd_scheduler_store_status{instance="$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", type="store_available"}) by (address, store) / sum(pd_scheduler_store_status{instance="$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", type="store_capacity"}) by (address, store)

sum(pd_scheduler_store_status{instance="$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", type="region_size"}) by (address, store) / sum(pd_scheduler_store_status{instance="$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", type="store_used"}) by (address, store) * 2^20

panels.title: Hot write Region's leader written bytes
Hot read Region's leader read bytes
